00059 typedef std::map< TString, TChain* > chain_map_t;
00060 typedef std::map< TString, chain_map_t > tag_chain_map_t;
00061 
00062 std::vector<TString> ReadRegionsFromFile(TString fileName){
00063   ifstream file(fileName);
00064   std::vector<TString> regions;
00065   TString region;
00066 
00067   while(file.peek()!=EOF && file.good()){
00068     if(file.peek()==10){ // 10 = \n
00069       file.get(); 
00070       continue;
00071     }
00072 
00073     if(file.peek() == 35){ // 35 = #
00074       file.ignore(1000,10); // ignore the rest of the line until \n
00075       continue;
00076     }
00077 
00078     file >> region;
00079     file.ignore(1000,10); // ignore the rest of the line until \n
00080 #ifdef DEBUG
00081     std::cout << "[DEBUG] Reading region: " << region<< std::endl;
00082 #endif
00083     regions.push_back(region);
00084 
00085   }
00086   return regions;
00087 }

00089 
00090 void UpdateFriends(tag_chain_map_t& tagChainMap, TString regionsFileNameTag){
00091 
00092   for(tag_chain_map_t::const_iterator tag_chain_itr=tagChainMap.begin();
00093       tag_chain_itr!=tagChainMap.end();
00094       tag_chain_itr++){
00095     TChain *chain = (tag_chain_itr->second.find("selected"))->second;
00096     //    std::cout << chain->GetName() << std::endl;
00097     for(chain_map_t::const_iterator chain_itr=tag_chain_itr->second.begin();
00098         chain_itr!=tag_chain_itr->second.end();
00099         chain_itr++){
00100 
00101       if(chain_itr->first!="selected"){
00102         if(chain->GetFriend(chain_itr->first)==NULL){
00103           std::cout << "[STATUS] Adding friend branch: " << chain_itr->first
00104                     << " to tag " << tag_chain_itr->first << std::endl;
00105           chain->AddFriend(chain_itr->second);
00106         } // already added
00107       }
00108 
00109       if(chain->GetEntries()!= chain_itr->second->GetEntries()){
00110         std::cerr << "[ERROR] Not the same number of events: " << chain->GetEntries() << "\t" << chain_itr->second->GetEntries() << std::endl;
00111         exit(1);
00112       }
00113     }
00114   }
00115   return;
00116 }
00117 
00118 void Dump(tag_chain_map_t& tagChainMap, TString tag="s", Long64_t firstentry=0){
00119   (tagChainMap[tag])["selected"]->Scan("etaEle:R9Ele:energySCEle_regrCorrSemiParV5_pho/cosh(etaSCEle):smearerCat:catName","","col=5:4:5:3:50",5,firstentry);
00120 };

00122 void MergeSamples(tag_chain_map_t& tagChainMap, TString regionsFileNameTag, TString tag="s"){
00123   
00124   std::pair<TString, chain_map_t > pair_tmp_tag(tag,chain_map_t()); // make_pair not work with scram b
00125   tagChainMap.insert(pair_tmp_tag);
00126   
00127   for(tag_chain_map_t::const_iterator tag_chain_itr=tagChainMap.begin();
00128       tag_chain_itr!=tagChainMap.end();
00129       tag_chain_itr++){
00130 
00131     if(tag_chain_itr->first.CompareTo(tag)==0 || !tag_chain_itr->first.Contains(tag)) continue; //do it for each sample
00132     //TChain *chain = (tag_chain_itr->second.find("selected"))->second;
00133     //    std::cout << chain->GetName() << std::endl;
00134     for(chain_map_t::const_iterator chain_itr=tag_chain_itr->second.begin();
00135         chain_itr!=tag_chain_itr->second.end();
00136         chain_itr++){
00137       TString chainName = chain_itr->first;
00138       if(tagChainMap.count(chainName)==0){ // create the new chain if does not exist for tag
00139         std::pair<TString, TChain* > pair_tmp(chainName, new TChain(chainName));
00140         (tagChainMap[tag]).insert(pair_tmp);
00141         (tagChainMap[tag])[chainName]->SetTitle(tag);
00142       }
00143       (tagChainMap[tag])[chainName]->Add(chain_itr->second);
00144       std::cout << tag << "\t" << tag_chain_itr->first << "\t" << chainName <<  "\t" << chain_itr->second << "\t" << chain_itr->second->GetTitle() << std::endl;
00145       
00146     }
00147   }
00148   UpdateFriends(tagChainMap, regionsFileNameTag);
00149   return;
00150 }

00152 
00153 TChain * addChainAndFriends(TString chainName, std::vector<TChain *> chain_vec){
00154   TChain *sumChain = new TChain(chainName,"");
00155   
00156   std::map<TString, TChain *> friends_map;
00157   for(std::vector<TChain *>::const_iterator chain_itr = chain_vec.begin();
00158       chain_itr!=chain_vec.end();
00159       chain_itr++){
00160     
00161     TList *friendList= (*chain_itr)->GetListOfFriends();
00162     TIter newfriend_itr(friendList);
00163 
00164     for(TFriendElement *friendElement = (TFriendElement*) newfriend_itr.Next(); 
00165         friendElement != NULL; friendElement = (TFriendElement*) newfriend_itr.Next()){
00166       TString treeName=friendElement->GetTreeName();
00167       std::cout << "[STATUS] Adding new friend " << treeName  << std::endl;
00168       std::map<TString, TChain*>::iterator map_itr = friends_map.find(treeName);
00169       if(map_itr==friends_map.end()){
00170         friends_map[treeName] = new TChain(treeName,"");
00171       }
00172       friends_map[treeName]->Add((TChain *)friendElement->GetTree());
00173     }
00174   }
00175 
00176   for(std::vector<TChain *>::const_iterator chain_itr = chain_vec.begin();
00177       chain_itr!=chain_vec.end();
00178       chain_itr++){
00179     sumChain->Add(*chain_itr);  
00180   }
00181 
00182   for(std::map<TString,TChain *>::const_iterator map_itr = friends_map.begin();
00183       map_itr != friends_map.end();
00184       map_itr++){
00185     sumChain->AddFriend(map_itr->second);
00186   }
00187   sumChain->GetListOfFriends()->Print();
00188   return sumChain;
00189 }

00481     }

00499       tagChainMap.insert(pair_tmp);

00504       (tagChainMap[tag]).insert(pair_tmp);
00505       (tagChainMap[tag])[chainName]->SetTitle(tag);
00506     }

00508     if((tagChainMap[tag])[chainName]->Add(fileName,-1)==0) exit(1);
00509 #ifdef DEBUG
00510     std::cout << "[DEBUG] " << tag << "\t" << chainName << "\t" << fileName << "\t" << (tagChainMap[tag])[chainName]->GetEntries() << std::endl;
00511 #endif

00877     scale_->setError(0.005); // 1%
00878     //    scale_->setConstant();
00879     //    scale_->setBinning(RooBinning(

00881

00883     TPRegexp reg("Et_[0-9]*_[0-9]*");
00884     reg.Substitute(varName,"");
00885     TPRegexp reg2("energySC_[0-9]*_[0-9]*");
00886     reg2.Substitute(varName,"");
00887     varName.ReplaceAll("--","-");
00888     if(varName.First("-")==0) varName.Remove(0,1);
00889 
00890     //RooRealVar *const_term_ = new RooRealVar("constTerm_"+*region_itr, "constTerm_"+*region_itr, 0.01, 0.0005, 0.05);

00892     RooRealVar *const_term_v = args.getSize() ==0 ? NULL : (RooRealVar *) args.find("constTerm_"+varName);
00893     if(const_term_v==NULL){
00894       if(vm.count("constTermFix")==0) const_term_v = new RooRealVar("constTerm_"+*region_itr, "constTerm_"+varName,0.01, 0.000,0.05); 
00895       else const_term_v = new RooRealVar("constTerm_"+varName, "constTerm_"+varName,0.01, 0.000,0.02);
00896       const_term_v->setError(0.03); // 1%

00899     } 
00900     if((reg.MatchB(*region_itr) || reg2.MatchB(*region_itr) )&& vm.count("constTermFix")==1){
00901       const_term_ = new RooFormulaVar("constTerm_"+*region_itr, "constTerm_"+varName,"@0", *const_term_v);
00902       const_term_v->setConstant(false);
00903     } else const_term_ = const_term_v;
00904 
00905 
00906 
00907     RooAbsReal *alpha_=NULL;

00909     if(alpha_v==NULL){
00910       alpha_v = new RooRealVar("alpha_"+varName, "alpha_"+varName,0.0, 0.,0.20);
00911       alpha_v->setError(0.01);
00912       alpha_v->setConstant(true);
00913       //alpha_v->Print();
00914       if(!vm.count("alphaGoldFix") || !region_itr->Contains("absEta_1_1.4442-gold")){
00915         args.add(*alpha_v);
00916       }
00917     } 
00918     if(reg.MatchB(*region_itr) && vm.count("constTermFix")==1){
00919       if(vm.count("alphaGoldFix") && region_itr->Contains("absEta_1_1.4442-gold")){
00920         std::cout << "[STATUS] Fixing alpha term to low eta region " << *region_itr << std::endl;
00921         std::cerr << "[STATUS] Fixing alpha term to low eta region " << *region_itr << std::endl;
00922         TString lowRegionVarName=varName; lowRegionVarName.ReplaceAll("absEta_1_1.4442","absEta_0_1");
00923         alpha_v = (RooRealVar *)args.find("alpha_"+lowRegionVarName);
00924         alpha_ = new RooFormulaVar("alpha_"+*region_itr, "alpha_"+lowRegionVarName,"@0", *alpha_v);
00925       } else {
00926         alpha_ = new RooFormulaVar("alpha_"+*region_itr, "alpha_"+varName,"@0", *alpha_v);
00927       }
00928       alpha_v->setConstant(false);
00929     } else alpha_ = alpha_v;
00930     
00931     args_vec.push_back(RooArgSet(*scale_, *alpha_, *const_term_));
00932   }

00934   args.sort(kFALSE);
